attributes.review: When I downloaded this app all of the sudden my phone started glitching and being totally different.  Even on the app weird glitches would happen. It’s like someone started hacking my phone to steal all of my information. PLEASE DELETE THIS APP AND CHANGE ALL OF YOUR PASSWORDS!!
attributes.title: SCAM APP!

attributes.review: so when i downloaded this app when i first opened it, i saw trumps face! it was SO gross 🤢 do not download it because i saw something even worse after that... I SAW HIM THROWING UP! it was orange too! like him but anyways after that i un installed it. 🤮
attributes.title: this app is disgusting

attributes.review: I downloaded this app with curiosity wonder what it was about since I had never heard of it or the person on it so I open the app and all I saw was a ORANGE MAN with looks like the hair from a blonde girl that just cut off her hair🤢. I have never been so scared in my life.
attributes.title: HIDE YOUR CHILDREN

attributes.review: i hate this, i hate this SO much. i wanted to see what was so “great” about that oversized, orange, and guess what i found? nothing!!! am i surprised? no. it just reaffirmed my point that he is an oversized, whiny, incompetent manbaby. delete this app please, not worth it.
attributes.title: a-awful (like him)🤢🤮

attributes.review: as i was using the app to shop for my penguins, i realized my head was itching so naturally, i itch it. a few moments later i realized that i had lice. this was not the first time the gosh darn awful app gave me lice. it has done it 2307 times in the past and it continues to do it. my mother doesn’t let me in the house anymore and now i live in the street with no anti-lice pills. this app has ruined my life. the cheeto has some never putting this in the app store 😾🟠!
attributes.title: absolute trash 😾

attributes.review: very very low quality app. it was very disturbing to see many of the things on so app, i don’t recommend downloading it because it was the biggest waste of time of my LIFE.
attributes.title: horrible and disappointing

attributes.review: Well the name says it all. He’s an egomaniac who is obsessed with his own image and wants to blame our problems on someone else instead of solving them (because he doesn’t know how to solve promises, only stir up anger and resentment, and promote himself). A national disgrace.
attributes.title: Worst app ever

attributes.review: I downloaded the app to know when the next rally is.  But instead I got the Cheeto virus. I opened the app and all I saw was this ugly orange man. It was traumatizing. I will now the scarred for life. A orange man hunting my dreams every night. So if I was you I would not download this app. Thank you
attributes.title: Very bad

attributes.review: He getting a spray tan with his little shrimp 🍤 out. How did he get even one child with that thing 😭🥴 How do you even feel anything with that centimeter wiener. Anyways imma go eat some cashews and kill myself
attributes.title: I’d rather dive off a cliff into a steaming pile of dog crap and suffocate to death

attributes.review: When I first opened the app, there was a very offensive image of an orangutan flicking me off in my native language. I then proceeded to create an account. It asked me to select my ethnicity and I selected African American. A message pop up saying “error”. LIKE WHAT!! This has to be a joke!!
attributes.title: THIS IS A TERRIBLE APP!!
